text: Paul [strongs id="g3972" /], a servant [strongs id="g1401" /] of God [strongs id="g2316" /], and [strongs id="g1161" /] an apostle [strongs id="g0652" /] of Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /], according to [strongs id="g2596" /] the faith [strongs id="g4102" /] of God’s [strongs id="g2316" /] elect [strongs id="g1588" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] the acknowledging [strongs id="g1922" /] of the truth [strongs id="g0225" /] which [strongs id="g3588" /] is after [strongs id="g2596" /] godliness [strongs id="g2150" /];

In [strongs id="g1909" /] hope [strongs id="g1680" /] of eternal [strongs id="g0166" /] life [strongs id="g2222" /], which [strongs id="g3739" /] God [strongs id="g2316" /], that cannot lie [strongs id="g0893" /], promised [strongs id="g1861" m="AorMidDepInd" /] before [strongs id="g4253" /] the world [strongs id="g0166" /] began [strongs id="g5550" /];

But [strongs id="g1161" /] hath [strongs id="g5319" /] in due [strongs id="g2398" /] times [strongs id="g2540" /] manifested [strongs id="g5319" m="AorActInd" /] his [strongs id="g0846" /] word [strongs id="g3056" /] through [strongs id="g1722" /] preaching [strongs id="g2782" /], which [strongs id="g3739" /] is committed [strongs id="g4100" m="AorPasInd" /] unto me [strongs id="g1473" /] according to [strongs id="g2596" /] the commandment [strongs id="g2003" /] of God [strongs id="g2316" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] Saviour [strongs id="g4990" /];

To Titus [strongs id="g5103" /], [mine] own [strongs id="g1103" /] son [strongs id="g5043" /] after [strongs id="g2596" /] the common [strongs id="g2839" /] faith [strongs id="g4102" /]: Grace [strongs id="g5485" /], mercy [strongs id="g1656" /], [and] peace [strongs id="g1515" /], from [strongs id="g0575" /] God [strongs id="g2316" /] the Father [strongs id="g3962" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] the Lord [strongs id="g2962" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] Saviour [strongs id="g4990" /].

For this [strongs id="g5127" /] cause [strongs id="g5484" /] left I [strongs id="g2641" m="Aor2ActInd" /] thee [strongs id="g4571" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] Crete [strongs id="g2914" /], that [strongs id="g2443" /] thou shouldest set in order [strongs id="g1930" m="AorMidSubj" /] the things that are wanting [strongs id="g3007" m="PresActPtc" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] ordain [strongs id="g2525" m="AorActSubj" /] elders [strongs id="g4245" /] in every [strongs id="g2596" /] city [strongs id="g4172" /], as [strongs id="g5613" /] I [strongs id="g1473" /] had appointed [strongs id="g1299" m="AorMidInd" /] thee [strongs id="g4671" /]:

If any [strongs id="g1536" /] be [strongs id="g2076" m="PresInd" /] blameless [strongs id="g0410" /], the husband [strongs id="g0435" /] of one [strongs id="g3391" /] wife [strongs id="g1135" /], having [strongs id="g2192" m="PresActPtc" /] faithful [strongs id="g4103" /] children [strongs id="g5043" /] not [strongs id="g3361" /] accused [strongs id="g1722" /] [strongs id="g2724" /] of riot [strongs id="g0810" /] or [strongs id="g2228" /] unruly [strongs id="g0506" /].

For [strongs id="g1063" /] a bishop [strongs id="g1985" /] must [strongs id="g1163" m="PresInd" /] be [strongs id="g1511" m="PresInf" /] blameless [strongs id="g0410" /], as [strongs id="g5613" /] the steward [strongs id="g3623" /] of God [strongs id="g2316" /]; not [strongs id="g3361" /] selfwilled [strongs id="g0829" /], not [strongs id="g3361" /] soon angry [strongs id="g3711" /], not [strongs id="g3361" /] given to wine [strongs id="g3943" /], no [strongs id="g3361" /] striker [strongs id="g4131" /], not [strongs id="g3361" /] given to filthy lucre [strongs id="g0146" /];

But [strongs id="g0235" /] a lover of hospitality [strongs id="g5382" /], a lover of good men [strongs id="g5358" /], sober [strongs id="g4998" /], just [strongs id="g1342" /], holy [strongs id="g3741" /], temperate [strongs id="g1468" /];

Holding fast [strongs id="g0472" m="PresMidPasDepPtc" /] the faithful [strongs id="g4103" /] word [strongs id="g3056" /] as [strongs id="g2596" /] he hath been taught [strongs id="g1322" /], that [strongs id="g2443" /] he may be [strongs id="g5600" m="PresSubj" /] able [strongs id="g1415" /] by [strongs id="g1722" /] sound [strongs id="g5198" m="PresActPtc" /] doctrine [strongs id="g1319" /] both [strongs id="g2532" /] to exhort [strongs id="g3870" m="PresActInf" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] to convince [strongs id="g1651" m="PresActInf" /] the gainsayers [strongs id="g0483" m="PresActPtc" /].

For [strongs id="g1063" /] there are [strongs id="g1526" m="PresInd" /] many [strongs id="g4183" /] unruly [strongs id="g0506" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] vain talkers [strongs id="g3151" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] deceivers [strongs id="g5423" /], specially [strongs id="g3122" /] they of [strongs id="g1537" /] the circumcision [strongs id="g4061" /]:

Whose [strongs id="g3739" /] mouths [strongs id="g1993" /] must [strongs id="g1163" m="PresInd" /] be stopped [strongs id="g1993" m="PresActInf" /], who [strongs id="g3748" /] subvert [strongs id="g0396" m="PresActInd" /] whole [strongs id="g3650" /] houses [strongs id="g3624" /], teaching [strongs id="g1321" m="PresActPtc" /] things which [strongs id="g3739" /] they ought [strongs id="g1163" m="PresInd" /] not [strongs id="g3361" /], for [strongs id="g5484" /] filthy [strongs id="g0150" /] lucre’s [strongs id="g2771" /] sake [strongs id="g5484" /].

One [strongs id="g5100" /] of [strongs id="g1537" /] themselves [strongs id="g0846" /], [even] a prophet [strongs id="g4396" /] of their [strongs id="g0846" /] own [strongs id="g2398" /], said [strongs id="g2036" m="Aor2ActInd" /], The Cretians [strongs id="g2912" /] [are] alway [strongs id="g0104" /] liars [strongs id="g5583" /], evil [strongs id="g2556" /] beasts [strongs id="g2342" /], slow [strongs id="g0692" /] bellies [strongs id="g1064" /].

This [strongs id="g3778" /] witness [strongs id="g3141" /] is [strongs id="g2076" m="PresInd" /] true [strongs id="g0227" /]. Wherefore [strongs id="g1223" /] [strongs id="g3739" /] [strongs id="g0156" /] rebuke [strongs id="g1651" m="PresActImpr" /] them [strongs id="g0846" /] sharply [strongs id="g0664" /], that [strongs id="g2443" /] they may be sound [strongs id="g5198" m="PresActSubj" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] the faith [strongs id="g4102" /];

Not [strongs id="g3361" /] giving heed [strongs id="g4337" m="PresActPtc" /] to Jewish [strongs id="g2451" /] fables [strongs id="g3454" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] commandments [strongs id="g1785" /] of men [strongs id="g0444" /], that turn from [strongs id="g0654" m="PresMidPtc" /] the truth [strongs id="g0225" /].

Unto the pure [strongs id="g2513" /] all things [strongs id="g3956" /] [are] pure [strongs id="g3303" /] [strongs id="g2513" /]: but [strongs id="g1161" /] unto them that are defiled [strongs id="g3392" m="PerfPasPtc" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] unbelieving [strongs id="g0571" /] [is] nothing [strongs id="g3762" /] pure [strongs id="g2513" /]; but [strongs id="g0235" /] even [strongs id="g2532" /] their [strongs id="g0846" /] mind [strongs id="g3563" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] conscience [strongs id="g4893" /] is defiled [strongs id="g3392" m="PerfPasInd" /].

They profess [strongs id="g3670" m="PresActInd" /] that they know [strongs id="g1492" m="PerfActInf" /] God [strongs id="g2316" /]; but [strongs id="g1161" /] in works [strongs id="g2041" /] they deny [strongs id="g0720" m="PresMidPasDepInd" /] [him], being [strongs id="g5607" m="PresPtc" /] abominable [strongs id="g0947" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] disobedient [strongs id="g0545" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] unto [strongs id="g4314" /] every [strongs id="g3956" /] good [strongs id="g0018" /] work [strongs id="g2041" /] reprobate [strongs id="g0096" /].

But [strongs id="g1161" /] speak [strongs id="g2980" m="PresActImpr" /] thou [strongs id="g4771" /] the things which [strongs id="g3739" /] become [strongs id="g4241" m="PresActInd" /] sound [strongs id="g5198" m="PresActPtc" /] doctrine [strongs id="g1319" /]:

That the aged men [strongs id="g4246" /] be [strongs id="g1511" m="PresInf" /] sober [strongs id="g3524" /], grave [strongs id="g4586" /], temperate [strongs id="g4998" /], sound [strongs id="g5198" m="PresActPtc" /] in faith [strongs id="g4102" /], in charity [strongs id="g0026" /], in patience [strongs id="g5281" /].

The aged women [strongs id="g4247" /] likewise [strongs id="g5615" /], that [they be] in [strongs id="g1722" /] behaviour [strongs id="g2688" /] as becometh holiness [strongs id="g2412" /], not [strongs id="g3361" /] false accusers [strongs id="g1228" /], not [strongs id="g3361" /] given [strongs id="g1402" m="PerfPasPtc" /] to much [strongs id="g4183" /] wine [strongs id="g3631" /], teachers of good things [strongs id="g2567" /];

That [strongs id="g2443" /] they may teach [strongs id="g4994" /] the young women [strongs id="g3501" /] to be [strongs id="g1511" m="PresInf" /] sober [strongs id="g4994" m="PresActSubj" /], to love their husbands [strongs id="g5362" /], to love their children [strongs id="g5388" /],

[To be] discreet [strongs id="g4998" /], chaste [strongs id="g0053" /], keepers at home [strongs id="g3626" /], good [strongs id="g0018" /], obedient [strongs id="g5293" m="PresPasPtc" /] to their own [strongs id="g2398" /] husbands [strongs id="g0435" /], that [strongs id="g3363" /] the word [strongs id="g3056" /] of God [strongs id="g2316" /] be [strongs id="g0987" /] not [strongs id="g3363" /] blasphemed [strongs id="g0987" m="PresPasSubj" /].
Young men [strongs id="g3501" /] likewise [strongs id="g5615" /] exhort [strongs id="g3870" m="PresActImpr" /] to be sober minded [strongs id="g4993" m="PresActInf" /].

In [strongs id="g4012" /] all things [strongs id="g3956" /] shewing [strongs id="g3930" m="PresMidPtc" /] thyself [strongs id="g4572" /] a pattern [strongs id="g5179" /] of good [strongs id="g2570" /] works [strongs id="g2041" /]: in [strongs id="g1722" /] doctrine [strongs id="g1319" /] [shewing] uncorruptness [strongs id="g0090" /], gravity [strongs id="g4587" /], sincerity [strongs id="g0861" /],

Sound [strongs id="g5199" /] speech [strongs id="g3056" /], that cannot be condemned [strongs id="g0176" /]; that [strongs id="g2443" /] he that is of [strongs id="g1537" /] the contrary part [strongs id="g1727" /] may be ashamed [strongs id="g1788" m="Aor2PasSubj" /], having [strongs id="g2192" m="PresActPtc" /] no [strongs id="g3367" /] evil [strongs id="g5337" /] thing [strongs id="g3367" /] to say [strongs id="g3004" m="PresActInf" /] of [strongs id="g4012" /] you [strongs id="g5216" /].

[Exhort] servants [strongs id="g1401" /] to be obedient [strongs id="g5293" m="PresMidInf" /] unto their own [strongs id="g2398" /] masters [strongs id="g1203" /], [and] to [strongs id="g1511" m="PresInf" /] please [them] well [strongs id="g2101" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] all [strongs id="g3956" /] [things]; not [strongs id="g3361" /] answering again [strongs id="g0483" m="PresActPtc" /];

Not [strongs id="g3361" /] purloining [strongs id="g3557" m="PresMidPtc" /], but [strongs id="g0235" /] shewing [strongs id="g1731" m="PresMidPtc" /] all [strongs id="g3956" /] good [strongs id="g0018" /] fidelity [strongs id="g4102" /]; that [strongs id="g2443" /] they may adorn [strongs id="g2885" m="PresActSubj" /] the doctrine [strongs id="g1319" /] of God [strongs id="g2316" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] Saviour [strongs id="g4990" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] all things [strongs id="g3956" /].

For [strongs id="g1063" /] the grace [strongs id="g5485" /] of God [strongs id="g2316" /] that bringeth salvation [strongs id="g4992" /] hath appeared [strongs id="g2014" m="Aor2PasDepSubj" /] to all [strongs id="g3956" /] men [strongs id="g0444" /],

Teaching [strongs id="g3811" m="PresActPtc" /] us [strongs id="g2248" /] that [strongs id="g2443" /], denying [strongs id="g0720" m="AorMidDepPtc" /] ungodliness [strongs id="g0763" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] worldly [strongs id="g2886" /] lusts [strongs id="g1939" /], we should live [strongs id="g2198" m="AorActSubj" /] soberly [strongs id="g4996" /], [strongs id="g2532" /] righteously [strongs id="g1346" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] godly [strongs id="g2153" /], in [strongs id="g1722" /] this present [strongs id="g3568" /] world [strongs id="g0165" /];

Looking for [strongs id="g4327" m="PresMidPasDepPtc" /] that blessed [strongs id="g3107" /] hope [strongs id="g1680" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] the glorious [strongs id="g1391" /] appearing [strongs id="g2015" /] of the great [strongs id="g3173" /] God [strongs id="g2316" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] Saviour [strongs id="g4990" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /];

Who [strongs id="g3739" /] gave [strongs id="g1325" m="AorActInd" /] himself [strongs id="g1438" /] for [strongs id="g5228" /] us [strongs id="g2257" /], that [strongs id="g2443" /] he might redeem [strongs id="g3084" m="AorMidSubj" /] us [strongs id="g2248" /] from [strongs id="g0575" /] all [strongs id="g3956" /] iniquity [strongs id="g0458" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] purify [strongs id="g2511" m="AorActSubj" /] unto himself [strongs id="g1438" /] a peculiar [strongs id="g4041" /] people [strongs id="g2992" /], zealous [strongs id="g2207" /] of good [strongs id="g2570" /] works [strongs id="g2041" /].

These things [strongs id="g5023" /] speak [strongs id="g2980" m="PresActImpr" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] exhort [strongs id="g3870" m="PresActImpr" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] rebuke [strongs id="g1651" m="PresActImpr" /] with [strongs id="g3326" /] all [strongs id="g3956" /] authority [strongs id="g2003" /]. Let [strongs id="g4065" /] no man [strongs id="g3367" /] despise [strongs id="g4065" m="PresActImpr" /] thee [strongs id="g4675" /].

Put [strongs id="g5279" /] them [strongs id="g0846" /] in mind [strongs id="g5279" m="PresActImpr" /] to be subject [strongs id="g5293" m="PresMidInf" /] to principalities [strongs id="g0746" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] powers [strongs id="g1849" /], to obey magistrates [strongs id="g3980" m="PresActInf" /], to be [strongs id="g1511" m="PresInf" /] ready [strongs id="g2092" /] to [strongs id="g4314" /] every [strongs id="g3956" /] good [strongs id="g0018" /] work [strongs id="g2041" /],

To speak evil of [strongs id="g0987" m="PresActInf" /] no man [strongs id="g3367" /], to be [strongs id="g1511" m="PresInf" /] no brawlers [strongs id="g0269" /], [but] gentle [strongs id="g1933" /], shewing [strongs id="g1731" m="PresMidPtc" /] all [strongs id="g3956" /] meekness [strongs id="g4236" /] unto [strongs id="g4314" /] all [strongs id="g3956" /] men [strongs id="g0444" /].

For [strongs id="g1063" /] we ourselves [strongs id="g2249" /] also [strongs id="g2532" /] were [strongs id="g2258" m="ImpfInd" /] [strongs id="g0453" /] sometimes [strongs id="g4218" /] foolish [strongs id="g0453" /], disobedient [strongs id="g0545" /], deceived [strongs id="g4105" m="PresPasPtc" /], serving [strongs id="g1398" m="PresActPtc" /] divers [strongs id="g4164" /] lusts [strongs id="g1939" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] pleasures [strongs id="g2237" /], living [strongs id="g1236" m="PresActPtc" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] malice [strongs id="g2549" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] envy [strongs id="g5355" /], hateful [strongs id="g4767" /], [and] hating [strongs id="g3404" m="PresActPtc" /] one another [strongs id="g0240" /].

But [strongs id="g1161" /] after [strongs id="g3753" /] that the kindness [strongs id="g5544" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] love [strongs id="g5363" /] of God [strongs id="g2316" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] Saviour [strongs id="g4990" /] toward man [strongs id="g5363" /] appeared [strongs id="g2014" m="Aor2PasDepSubj" /],

Not [strongs id="g3756" /] by [strongs id="g1537" /] works [strongs id="g2041" /] of [strongs id="g1722" /] righteousness [strongs id="g1343" /] which [strongs id="g3739" /] we [strongs id="g2249" /] have done [strongs id="g4160" m="AorActInd" /], but [strongs id="g0235" /] according to [strongs id="g2596" /] his [strongs id="g0846" /] mercy [strongs id="g1656" /] he saved [strongs id="g4982" m="AorActInd" /] us [strongs id="g2248" /], by [strongs id="g1223" /] the washing [strongs id="g3067" /] of regeneration [strongs id="g3824" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] renewing [strongs id="g0342" /] of the Holy [strongs id="g0040" /] Ghost [strongs id="g4151" /];

Which [strongs id="g3739" /] he shed [strongs id="g1632" m="AorActInd" /] on [strongs id="g1909" /] us [strongs id="g2248" /] abundantly [strongs id="g4146" /] through [strongs id="g1223" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] Saviour [strongs id="g4990" /];

That [strongs id="g2443" /] being justified by [strongs id="g1344" m="AorPasPtc" /] his [strongs id="g1565" /] grace [strongs id="g5485" /], we should be made [strongs id="g1096" m="Aor2MidDepSubj" /] heirs [strongs id="g2818" /] according to [strongs id="g2596" /] the hope [strongs id="g1680" /] of eternal [strongs id="g0166" /] life [strongs id="g2222" /].

[This is] a faithful [strongs id="g4103" /] saying [strongs id="g3056" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] these things [strongs id="g4012" /] [strongs id="g5130" /] I will [strongs id="g1014" m="PresMidPasDepInd" /] that thou [strongs id="g4571" /] affirm constantly [strongs id="g1226" m="PresMidPasDepInf" /], that [strongs id="g2443" /] they which have believed [strongs id="g4100" m="PerfActPtc" /] in God [strongs id="g2316" /] might be careful [strongs id="g5431" m="PresActSubj" /] to maintain [strongs id="g4291" m="PresMidInf" /] good [strongs id="g2570" /] works [strongs id="g2041" /]. These things [strongs id="g5023" /] are [strongs id="g2076" m="PresInd" /] good [strongs id="g2570" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] profitable [strongs id="g5624" /] unto men [strongs id="g0444" /].

But [strongs id="g1161" /] avoid [strongs id="g4026" m="PresMidImpr" /] foolish [strongs id="g3474" /] questions [strongs id="g2214" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] genealogies [strongs id="g1076" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] contentions [strongs id="g2054" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] strivings about [strongs id="g3163" /] the law [strongs id="g3544" /]; for [strongs id="g1063" /] they are [strongs id="g1526" m="PresInd" /] unprofitable [strongs id="g0512" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] vain [strongs id="g3152" /].

A man [strongs id="g0444" /] that is an heretick [strongs id="g0141" /] after [strongs id="g3326" /] the first [strongs id="g3391" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] second [strongs id="g1208" /] admonition [strongs id="g3559" /] reject [strongs id="g3868" m="PresMidPasDepImpr" /];
